tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE consultations (
  consultation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  doctor_id INT,
  date_time TIMESTAMP,
  diagnosis TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    patient_age INT,
    patient_gender VARCHAR(10),
    date_of_birth DATE
);

CREATE TABLE appointments (
    appointment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
    doctor_id INT,
    appointment_date TIMESTAMP,
    appointment_notes TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE consultations (consultation_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, doctor_id INT, start_time TIMESTAMP, end_time TIMESTAMP, diagnosis TEXT);
CREATE TABLE appointments (appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, doctor_id INT, appointment_date DATE, appointment_time TIME, status VARCHAR(50));
CREATE TABLE prescriptions (prescription_id INT PRIMARY KEY, consultation_id INT, medication_name VARCHAR(50), dosage INT, frequency VARCHAR(50));

CREATE TABLE patient_consultations (
    consultation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    doctor_id INT,
    consultation_date DATE,
    consultation_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE appointments (
    appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    doctor_id INT,
    appointment_date DATE,
    consultation_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE prescriptions (
    prescription_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    doctor_id INT,
    consultation_id INT,
    prescription_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    gender CHAR(1),
    date_of_birth DATE,
    phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    patient_age INT,
    patient_gender VARCHAR(10),
    patient_phone VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE consultations (
    consultation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    doctor_id INT,
    consultation_date DATE,
    consultation_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE appointments (
    appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    doctor_id INT,
    appointment_date DATE,
    appointment_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE prescriptions (
    prescription_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    doctor_id INT,
    prescription_date DATE,
    prescription_details TEXT
);
